00001 #ifndef _FFT_H
00002 #define _FFT_H  1
00003 /************************************************************************
00004  *                                                                      *
00005  * This subclass of object implements an object for computing fast      *
00006  * Fourier transforms, as well as DFTs and DCTs                         *
00007  *                                                                      *
00008  * File: FFT.h                                                          *
00009  *                                                                      *
00010  * Revision history:                                                    *
00011  *  1. 08/27/95  - Started                                              *
00012  *  2. 11/16/95  - Added more complex to real conversions.              *
00013  *  3. 04/30/97  - Add chirp Z transform stuff.                         *
00014  *  4. 08/25/99  - Add complex version of CZT.                          *
00015  ************************************************************************/
